participant_1.background:
My worst fear came true when my dog died last year.
the future scares me.
my suspenders sometimes make my shoulders hurt.
my husband is a firefighter.
I hope my family will understand that I need to make time for my music.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy exercising daily to stay in shape and maintain my energy levels.
but i m a frustrated driver.
i hate mexican food.
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents.
i like to cook stews.

content.text: I'm doing well. I'm a little nervous about the future, but overall I'm doing okay.
My worst fear came true when my dog died last year.
I'm so sorry to hear that. I lost my parents a few years ago and it was really tough.
Thank you. It was very hard. I'm not sure how I'm going to cope with the future.
My art has helped me cope with the loss of my parents. Maybe you could try something similar?
That's a good idea. I used to love to paint, but I haven't done it in a long time.
Why not start again? It could be really therapeutic.
I think I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem. I'm always here if you need someone to talk to.
